question: Aam Admi Bima Yojna (AABY) was launched in which among the following years?
explanation: Aam Admi Bima Yojna (AABY) was launched on October 2, 2007, insurance as accidental death and partial/permanent disability to the head of the family of rural households in the country. Provisions: (a) The head of the family or one earning member in the family will be insured; (b) The central government will bear 50 percent of the sum and the other 50 percent will financed by the state government.
